description: The HISTORY_INFO table contains notes and activities history information.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HISTORY_DATE
columns.description: The date when history information stored in the system.

columns.name: HISTORY_TIME
columns.description: The time when history information stored in the system.

columns.name: HISTORY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user record who created this history row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: HISTORY_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of this history information.
